metadata.synopsis: Top node plays if you talk to guard before they follow you into combat. Bottom node plays after combat (in which the guard took part.)

0.speaker: Watchman Gyordi
0.text: Didn't think I had any more fight left in me, but I'm glad to be wrong. If the city's still standing when this is over, I'll owe you. We all will.

1.speaker: Watchman Gyordi
1.text: Let us catch our breath, then we'll be right behind you, weapons at the ready.
